name: BOX VS BOX
description:
| PITCH

A box is a mysterious thing, you often don't know what's inside until you open it. In this local multiplayer you fight your friends with whatever weapon you get. Just avoid shooting yourself!

| WARNING

_ This game contains bright, colorfully flashing lights.

| CONTROLS:   2 Xbox Controllers

[Left Stick]   Left set of Tools
[Right Stick]   Right set of Tools
[Start/Back]   Menu
